Topic: SAML Authorization Assertions (Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > 001_Cryptography > 001_Cryptographic Protocols > 011_007_Federated Identity and Single Sign-On Protocols > SAML > SAML Authorization Assertions). Use this content scaffolding: [LAYER 1 FOUNDATION] [Insert full Layer 1 content] [LAYER 2 COMPONENTS] [Insert full Layer 2 content] [LAYER 3 IMPLEMENTATION] [Insert full Layer 3 content] [LAYER 4 INTEGRATION] [Insert full Layer 4 content] Incorporate learning objectives: [List all 6 objectives]. Embed active learning: Reference discussion (SAML vs ABAC trade-offs), peer-review XML exercise, SSO admin access scenario. Generate 40 flashcards per the schema: - Types: Definition/Recall, Component List, MCQ (4 opts, distractor protocol), Scenario Apply/Analyze. - Balance by layers/objectives/Bloom's. - Front: Engaging question. - Back: Answer + 1-2 sent explanation (pedagogy link) + reference. Output ONLY as numbered markdown list: 1. **Front:** [Question] **Type:** [e.g., MCQ] **Back:** Answer: [...] Explanation: [...] Reference: [...] Ensure completeness (full SAML statements: Authn, Attr, Authz), OASIS SAML V2.0 accuracy, voter priorities (pedagogy, clarity).
